mapper.insert: insert into order (id, number, status, src_name, src_phone_number, src_address, src_detail_address, dest_name, dest_phone_number, dest_address, dest_detail_address, customer_brand, dealer_id, order_type, shipping_type, expected_price, actual_price, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{srcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcDetailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destDetailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shippingType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{expectedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
